1E2.DU.summary: Gofore Oyj provides digitalisation consultancy services for private and public sector operators in Finland, Germany, Spain, and Estonia. The company engages in business design and transformation consulting; digital services design, build, and development; and maintenance and support partnership. It also engages in the management of digital change, service design, and software development, as well as provides cloud services utilisation and cloud capacity consulting services. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Tampere, Finland.

DIGIA.HE.summary: Digia Oyj provides software and services for organizations to develop services, manage business, and utilize data in Finland and internationally. The company offers service design and business consulting services; e-commerce solutions that designs and builds online stores; product information management services; applications and tailored mobile solutions; data and analytics solutions; integration and application programming interface solutions; and monitoring and service management solutions. It also provides enterprise resource planning (ERP) solutions comprising Digia Enterprise, an ERP system; financial solutions for fund management and asset management companies, and brokers; Microsoft Dynamics 365, an end-to-end business solution; Digia Logistics, an ERP system for logistics and forwarding companies; and customer relationship management (CRM) solutions. The company serves energy, banking and investment services, insurance, grocery, manufacturing, public sector, retail and wholesale, service business, social and healthcare services, and logistics industries, as well as trade unions and unemployment funds. Digia Oyj is headquartered in Helsinki, Finland.

NIXU.HE.summary: Nixu Oyj operates as a cybersecurity services company in Finland, Sweden, the Netherlands, Norway, Denmark, Belgium, and internationally. It offers services in the areas of business digitalization, cyber defense, cybersecurity outsourcing, security engineering, digital identity, cybersecurity exercises and training, IoT, cloud transformation, compliance and certification, and connected devices, as well as cloud security, safety, and reliability. The company provides services and sells licenses to business enterprises and the public sector. Nixu Oyj was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Espoo, Finland.

NXC.MU.summary: Nixu Oyj operates as a cybersecurity services company in Finland, Sweden, the Netherlands, Norway, Denmark, Belgium, and internationally. It offers services in the areas of business digitalization, cyber defense, cybersecurity outsourcing, security engineering, digital identity, cybersecurity exercises and training, IoT, cloud transformation, compliance and certification, and connected devices, as well as cloud security, safety, and reliability. The company provides services and sells licenses to business enterprises and the public sector. Nixu Oyj was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Espoo, Finland.

SIILI.HE.summary: Siili Solutions Oyj engages in the software integration and digital service businesses in Finland and internationally. The company offers strategy and consulting, experience design, engineering, data and intelligence, automation, and managed services. It also provides customized design and development services for the full lifecycle of digital services. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Helsinki, Finland.

TIETO.HE.summary: TietoEVRY Oyj operates as a software and services company. It operates through six segments: Digital Consulting, Cloud & Infra, Industry Software, Financial Services Solutions, International Operations, and Product Development Services. The Digital Consulting segment offers consulting services, including business and technology advisory, as well as system integration and managed application services. The Cloud & Infra segment provides automated solutions, which include managed cloud, security, and end-user services, as well as cloud migration advisory and transformation services. The Industry Software segment provides with industry-specific software products for business-critical processes of clients in the public and healthcare, and welfare sectors, as well as in the forest industry, and energy and oil and gas segments. The Financial Services Solutions segment offers real-time solution in the areas of payments, cards, wealth management, and credit, as well as BPO services. The Product Development Services segment offers software R&D services with a focus on the telecom sector, as well as new domains, such as automotive serving the communications infrastructure, consumer electronics, and semiconductor companies, and the automotive industry. The company also provides software advisory and consulting services, and industry specific software; and engages in the design, implementation, and maintenance of customized solutions and IT operations. It operates in Finland, Sweden, Norway, Austria, the Baltic countries, Russia, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Tieto Oyj and changed its name to TietoEVRY Oyj in December 2019. TietoEVRY Oyj was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Espoo, Finland.
